title:
Multivariate Alexander quandles, VI. Metabelian groups and 2-component
  links
abstract:
We prove two properties of the modules and quandles discussed in this series.
First, the fundamental multivariate Alexander quandle $Q_A(L)$ is isomorphic to
the natural image of the fundamental quandle in the metabelian quotient
$G(L)/G(L)''$ of the link group. Second, the medial quandle of a classical
2-component link $L$ is determined by the reduced Alexander invariant of $L$.
